__e: When Patty went away, did she ever tell you where she went?
You know this job with Patty... it was the greatest thing... I've ever had in my life, and yeh, it looks like it might cost me my family.
Found out Claire's father, Patty's husband, died three years ago.
Like, I said, I am Patty, and I gamble.
And when you took Patty's hand in there and told her that she wasn't alone, it broke my heart, because I am alone.
Patty and I had a long talk, and she wants me here.
I already told you, Patty, I don't feel like talking about my parents.
If I'm going to do this to patty, I can't see her again.
How long does it take to say, "Patty, I never want to see you again"?
Four days later, the CSI team enters Patty and JR's bedroom, one of the last places Patty was seen before she vanished.
You think patty tried to kill you to protect herself?
Do you think Patty has something to do with this?
